description: Python contains nice primitives for streaming data processing. @mrocklin's Toolz library extends them to enable gorgeous, concise, memory-frugal code. I'll present an intuitive approach to streaming analysis in Python, starting with a "hello world"-level example, moving through image correction and streaming sklearn classifiers, and finally analysing a complete genome in a few minutes.
title: Big Data in Little Laptop: A Streaming Story in Python
